name: National Museum
description: Premier museum complex showcasing Filipino history.
location: Padre Burgos Avenue, Ermita, Manila, Philippines

name: Ayala Museum
description: Modern museum featuring Filipino heritage, gold collections, dioramas, and contemporary art.
location: Makati Avenue, Ayala Center, Makati City, Philippines

name: Art in Island
description: 3D interactive art museum where visitors become part of the artworks in optical illusions.
location: 175 15th Avenue, Cubao, Quezon City, Philippines

name: Cebu City Public Library
description: Historic public library offering access to books, archives, and learning facilities.
location: Osmeña Blvd, Cebu City, Philippines

name: Museo Sugbo
description: Provincial museum housed in a former jail, showcasing Cebuano history and culture.
location: M.J. Cuenco Ave, Cebu City, Philippines

name: Casa Gorordo Museum
description: Restored 19th-century house museum reflecting Filipino-Spanish colonial lifestyle.
location: 35 Lopez Jaena St, Cebu City, Philippines

name: Culion Museum and Archives
description: Museum chronicling the history of Culion as a former leper colony.
location: Culion Island, Palawan, Philippines

name: South Sea Pearl Museum
description: Exhibition dedicated to the history, cultivation, and trade of the world-renowned Philippine South Sea Pearls.
location: Jewelmer Office, Puerto Princesa, Palawan, Philippines

name: Ethnographic Museum
description: Museum showcasing Palawan’s indigenous heritage, tribal artifacts, and cultural diversity.
location: Fernandez St, Puerto Princesa, Palawan, Philippines

name: La Castilla Museum
description: Former residence turned museum showcasing cultural artifacts and personal collections of the Liceo family.
location: Liceo de Cagayan University, Cagayan de Oro, Philippines

name: Museum of Three Cultures
description: Museum representing the cultures of Northern Mindanao through artifacts and art.
location: Capitol University, Cagayan de Oro, Philippines

name: Museo de Oro
description: Historical and archaeological museum focused on pre-colonial artifacts and indigenous heritage.
location: Xavier University, Corrales Ave, Cagayan de Oro, Philippines

name: Al Fahidi
description: Traditional district featuring architecture and cultural exhibits.
location: Bur Dubai, Al Fahidi, Dubai, UAE

name: Dubai Old Town
description: A charming area with souks, traditional architecture, and views of the creek.
location: Al Bastakiya, Dubai, UAE

name: Dubai Museum
description: Housed in Al Fahidi Fort, the museum showcases Dubai's heritage and pre-oil history.
location: Al Fahidi Fort, Bur Dubai, UAE

name: Museu do Aljube
description: Museum dedicated to the history of resistance against dictatorship and the fight for freedom in Portugal.
location: Rua de Augusto Rosa, Lisbon, Portugal

name: Fado Museum
description: Museum celebrating the traditional Portuguese music genre of Fado with exhibitions and audio experiences.
location: Largo do Chafariz de Dentro, Alfama, Lisbon, Portugal

name: Gulbenkian Museum
description: Renowned art museum featuring ancient to modern collections.
location: Avenida de Berna 45A, Lisbon, Portugal

name: Larco Museum
description: Museum featuring pre-Columbian art.
location: Av. Bolívar 1515, Pueblo Libre, Lima, Peru

name: Museo de Arte Italiano
description: A gift from the Italian community, this museum houses classical Italian sculptures, paintings, and decorative arts.
location: Paseo de la República 250, Cercado de Lima, Peru

name: Museo Pedro de Osma
description: Museum featuring fine religious art and furniture in a beautifully preserved mansion.
location: Av. Pedro de Osma 421, Barranco, Lima, Peru

name: Legacy Flight Museum
description: Exhibits of vintage aircraft and aviation history celebrating American aviation heritage.
location: 400 Airport Rd, Rexburg, Idaho, United States

name: Idaho Potato Museum
description: Interactive exhibits about Idaho’s potato industry, history, and impact on agriculture.
location: 130 NW Main St, Blackfoot, Idaho, United States

name: Romney Geology Museum
description: A BYU-Idaho museum showcasing mineral, fossil, and geological collections for all ages.
location: 242 S 1st E, Rexburg, Idaho, United States
